attributes.action: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to Welcome the formal state visit given to the Pope Benedict XVI
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As a nation that espouses religious tolerance, whereby "new" religions coming to this country in the past 1000 years are allowed to be practised without let or hindrance, the claims that the forthcoming State Visit of His Holiness Pope Benedict XVI should be forbidden due to the practices and beliefs of the Church are invalid.

This visit it is hoped will finally consign to the past Britain’s post-Reformation legacy of anti-Catholic prejudice, and will recognise one of the  greatest religious person in British history.

The Pope should be welcomed by whichever Prime Minister is in power as the head of the Roman Catholic Church and the head of the Vatican State.
